name: The Hero's After-Ending
description:
Everyone knows "The Hero's Journey", but... What happens after that?

Hi! This was a really fun project to work on :D.

A lot of times we see the whole adventure of a hero, but, what happens after that? Does everyone recognize their efforts? Do they fall into oblivion?

This was my way of answering that question. Hope you enjoy it!

Music Credits: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HVau-JRGirg&list=PLLc8dTL048VTO6m1FGTWak6lVuyW11lKe&index=17&t=0s

Azula💙
